#!/usr/bin/env ruby -w SUPPORT = ENV['TM_SUPPORT_PATH']
require "#{SUPPORT}/lib/osx/plist" require "#{SUPPORT}/lib/ui"
items = [] File.read("#{ENV['TM_BUNDLE_SUPPORT']}/entities.txt").scan(/^(\d+)\t(.+)$/) do |key, value| items << value end
options = { :items => items } res = TextMate::UI.request_item(options) abort if !res print '&' + res + ';'
